articles.author: Kylie Atwood, Jennifer Hansler and Nicole Gaouette
articles.title: First flight of Afghans who risked lives to help American troops arrive in US - CNN
articles.description: The first group of translators and interpreters who helped US soldiers and diplomats in Afghanistan arrived in the US on Friday, even as thousands more wait in Afghanistan in increasing fear of Taliban reprisals.
